en.title: FE Expands In The Philippines.
en.content:
FE is now expanding very fast in the Philippines, after our very successful launches in Thailand and USA. The stage is set for FE to become a global leader in the MLM industry!   

 

John Epperson and Dr. Romer Macalinao did a business opportunity meeting (BOM) to a big group of town councilors.
